channel.title: touchpad on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
channel.description: Recent content in touchpad on 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery

item.title: Cart
item.description: The cart receives video input from the camera and additional data from other connected devices, and then outputs the results on the monitor. 1 Primary Display – Produces 3840 x 2160p 3D resolution video. 3D images require passive, circularly-polarized 3D glasses. 2 Cable access – Routes cables from inside the system to external devices. 3 Front panel connectors – Includes 2 USB, an HDMI output, and a composite connector.

item.title: Keyboard and Mouse
item.description: The system includes both a wired and a wireless keyboard with an integrated touchpad. The wireless keyboard is rechargeable and the battery indicator displays the charge level while the keyboard is on. 1 Power indicator – Lights according to the battery status Blinking green - The battery is charging. Solid green – The battery has adequate charge. Blinking red – The battery power is low. Recharge the battery. 2 USB connector – Connects the keyboard to a power source to recharge the batteries.
